[#01# Player Infinite Super]
040F0000 02B87F50 466A6000
040F0000 02B87F60 466A6000
MOVE.L $466A6000, #$002B87F50(R15)
MOVE.L $466A6000, #$002B87F60(R15)

[#02# CPU No Super]
040F0000 02B87F60 00000000
040F0000 02B87F68 00000000
MOVE.L $00000000, #$002B87F60(R15)
MOVE.L $00000000, #$002B87F68(R15)

[#03# Player never KO]
080F0000 02B87F90 00780078 00780078
080F0000 02B87F98 00780078 00780078
MOVE.Q $0078007800780078, #$002B87F90(R15)
MOVE.Q $0078007800780078, #$002B87F98(R15)
